mapper.select: select kikiSysId from kikisystem ORDER BY kikiSysId DESC limit 1
select * from kikisystem order by kikiSysId desc limit 10
mapper.insert:

======= insert into kikisystem(kCode, kikiSysSeq , vNo, vNoSub, benMeisyo, keisikiRyaku, keisiki, sousaRyaku, sousa, classRyaku, classType, yobikeiRyaku, yobikei, szHouRyaku, szHou, szKikaku, zaisituRyaku, zaisitu, aturyokuMax, tani, ondoMax, ryutaiRyaku, ryutai, ics, futai, trkDate, updDate) values( >>>>>>> 488ace9fe74aaad305d1f83ccb1a2f6d22260ac2 #{kCode}, #{kikiSysSeq}, #{vNo}, #{vNoSub}, #{benMeisyo}, <<<<<<< HEAD #{kikiSysMei}, #{setSetubi}, #{setKiki}, #{setBasyo}, #{keitou}, #{houki}, ======= >>>>>>> 488ace9fe74aaad305d1f83ccb1a2f6d22260ac2 #{keisikiRyaku}, #{keisiki}, #{sousaRyaku}, #{sousa}, #{classRyaku}, #{classType}, #{yobikeiRyaku}, #{yobikei}, #{szHouRyaku}, #{szHou}, #{szKikaku}, #{zaisituRyaku}, #{zaisitu}, #{aturyokuMax}, #{tani}, #{ondoMax}, #{ryutaiRyaku}, #{ryutai}, #{ics}, #{futai}, #{trkDate}, #{updDate} )
mapper.update: update kikisystem set vNo = #{vNo}, vNoSub = #{vNoSub}, benMeisyo = #{benMeisyo}, keisikiRyaku = #{keisikiRyaku}, keisiki = #{keisiki}, sousaRyaku = #{sousaRyaku}, sousa = #{sousa}, classRyaku = #{classRyaku}, classType = #{classType}, yobikeiRyaku = #{yobikeiRyaku}, yobikei = #{yobikei}, szHouRyaku = #{szHouRyaku}, szHou = #{szHou}, szKikaku = #{szKikaku}, zaisituRyaku = #{zaisituRyaku}, zaisitu = #{zaisitu}, aturyokuMax = #{aturyokuMax}, tani = #{tani}, ondoMax = #{ondoMax}, ryutaiRyaku = #{ryutaiRyaku}, ryutai = #{ryutai}, ics = #{ics}, futai = #{futai}, updDate = #{updDate} where kikiSysId = #{kikiSysId}
mapper.delete: DELETE ks.*,ksl.*,k.*,b.* FROM kikisystemrelation ksl LEFT JOIN kikisystem ks ON ksl.kikisysid=ks.kikiSysId LEFT JOIN kiki k ON ksl.kikiId=k.kikiId LEFT JOIN buhin b ON ksl.buhinid=b.buhinId WHERE ksl.kikisysid=#{kikiSysId}
